author: uschindler
msg: Add a small optimization to enable users that use NumericRangeQuery with upper and lower point identical to be faster by using constant score boolean rewrite by default. By this NumericRangeQuery can be used like TermQuery to hit exactly one term.

author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-1530 Extend the "scr info" command to print the configuration policy
and the activate, deactivate and modified methods names.
Enhance the "scr list" command to indicate inactive bundles instead of
irritatingly listing them as not declaring components.

author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-1733 Prevent recreation of dead components when the components
of a ConfiguredComponentHolder have to be disposed off

author: sergeyb
msg: JAXRS : support for complex http headers
